entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
